title: Wrigley Field, The Much-Imitated, Never Duplicated Ballpark
teaser: Wrigley Field in Chicago, home to the hapless Cubs, turns 100 this year. NPR's Scott Simon visits Wrigley and talks to baseball great Ernie Banks and others about the legendary ballpark.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
